author: achapman
title: Frank Worthington: A Leicester legend who would give George Best a run for his money with his off the field antics, he loved the birds and the booze
text:
EFL 'The Working Man's Best' Frank Worthington: A Leicester legend who would give George Best a run for his money with his off the field antics, he loved the birds and the booze 
Foxes hero was as well known for living it up off the field as he was for his exquisite football skills By Phil Thomas 24th March 2017, 3:30 pm Updated: 24th March 2017, 3:36 pm
